net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation

Class AbstractValidator<V extends AbstractValidator<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.ui.miwt.validation.AbstractValidator<V>
  • Type Parameters:
    V - validator subclass.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CompositeValidator, PassAllValidator, RequiredLocalizationValidator, RequiredValueValidator, StringValueValidator

    public abstract class AbstractValidator<V extends AbstractValidator<V>>
extends Object
implements Validator
    Abstract implementation of validator. Provides getter and setter methods for localized text keys used to get the error message text from a LocaleContext. A default short message is provided if neither the short message key or the short message are provided.
    Author:
    Pat B. Double (double@i2rd.com)

      • setNotificationSourceSetter

        public void setNotificationSourceSetter(@Nullable
                                        NotificationSourceSetter<V> notificationSourceSetter)
        Set the notification source setter.

        Implementors must call setSource(Component, Notification) for any notifications created in Validator.validate(Component, Notifiable).

        Parameters:
        notificationSourceSetter - the notification source setter
        See Also:
        NotificationSourceSetter.defaultSourceSetter()
